title: Do you think Trump is a good man? Also do you think he is a better man than Obama?
selftext:
Hello, I’m a Tory and I just wanted to better understand my American counterpart’s views on Trump’s character.

THIS IS NOT a I would vote Obama over Trump poll. You could think that Obama is a better man but wouldn’t vote for him as you don’t want the dems in power. I think we all know who you would vote for.

Also try to somewhat separate the man from his political views, of course they affect each other but don’t just think well trump and I agree on more issues there for his is automatically a better man.

By good man, I’m asking about his character. Do you think he possesses virtues, do you think he is a good role model would you be happy if your child started to behave like him?

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/j37laq)
